title: After the Bankruptcy of the Supporting Male Lead - Novel Updates

author: Distant Spring Breeze   春风遥
description:
After transmigrating into a bankrupt supporting male lead unable to pay utility bills and blocked from finding a job anywhere, Chen Zhan decided to… get rich writing an autobiography!

Recalling the life of the vicious supporting male lead, he wrote a trilogy of his life, 《Confessions: The Birth and Death of a Rebellious Youth’s Emotions》,  《The Years When I Harassed the Queen of Film》, 《The Egg that Tried to Crush the Stone: Hatred for the Rich Me Me Slander the Rich CEO》….

Among them, 《Confessions》caused an uproar as soon as it was published.

In the beginning:

Female Lead: He’s just looking for attention.

Male Lead: If the heavens want him to die, they must first make him (Chen Zhan) crazy.

Passerbys A, B, C: Rubbish novels, whoever reads them is s*upid!

Then-

They all secretly became Chen Zhan’s readers.

Later, “Confessions” was completed, and the netizens: His talent was exhausted and this was just a temporary win.

The next day, it was revealed that Chen Zhan had captured the most mysterious and wealthy upstart in Y City.

Chen Zhan: Please support my new book: 《The Years When the Male God Chased Me》.

Netizens: …You won!!!>
